pageProduct.name: Vicks VapoNaturals Lemon Menthol Throat Lozenges 19 Naturally Flavoured Drops 70g Resealable Bag
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Vicks VapoNaturals Naturally Flavoured Drops coat your dry and itchy throat with a great tasting balance of lemon and menthol.

Vicks VapoNaturals Flavoured Drops


Coats dry and itchy throats.


Don't let an itchy throat ruin the moment.


Vicks VapoNaturals coats your dry and itchy throat with a great tasting balance of lemon and menthol.


Unleash the power of your voice with Vicks VapoNaturals.

Suitable For: Dry and itchy throats

Product Claims: Coats dry and itchy throats

Boxed Contents: Approx. 19 Drops

Size: 70g (Approx. 19 Drops)

Serving Size: 3.65g (1 drop)

Servings Per Pack: 70g (Approx. 19 drops)

KEY FEATURES

• Coats dry and itchy throats
• Lemon Menthol
• Naturally Flavoured Drops


Warnings

Not for children less than 2 years of age.

Ingredients

Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Fruit Juice Concentrate (Lemon), Acid (Citric Acid), Natural Flavours, Colour (160a).

Directions

Store below 25°C. Keep in cool dry place.
